attributes.action: Offer the Premiership to Nicola Sturgeon as the UK´s only true political leader.
attributes.additional_details: Politicians in Westminster have lost the trust and faith of the majority of the British public who have been left confused and distrustful of their constant infighting and self-serving manoeuvring instead of working together in the interests of the United Kingdom now that Brexit is a reality.
attributes.background: The House should consider offering the Premiership to Nicola Sturgeon as the only political leader who is prepared to stand up for her nation and fight for their rights.
